statements: SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50.00;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE cell_type = 'Neuron';
SELECT cell_type, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE cell_type = 'Macrophage' AND expression_level < 30.00;
SELECT DISTINCT cell_type FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC, gene_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT cell_type, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 GROUP BY cell_type ORDER BY avg_expression DESC
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' AND cell_type IN ('T cell', 'B cell') ORDER BY cell_type ASC, expression_level DESC
SELECT MAX(expression_level) AS max_expression FROM gene_expression_data
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_levels;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_levels WHERE cell_type = 'Neuron';
SELECT cell_type, expression_level FROM gene_expression_levels ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT cell_type FROM gene_expression_levels;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gene_expression_levels WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_levels WHERE cell_type='Neuron' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_levels WHERE expression_level > 5 AND cell_type='Fibroblast';
SELECT cell_type, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM gene_expression_levels GROUP BY cell_type;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_levels WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' AND cell_type='Lymphocyte' ORDER BY gene_name ASC, expression_level DESC;
SELECT cell_type_name, COUNT(*) AS num_cells FROM cell_types GROUP BY cell_type_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY num_cells DESC;
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, gene_start FROM Genes WHERE gene_end > 5000;
SELECT cell_type, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM GeneExpressionLevels GROUP BY cell_type;
SELECT cell_type_name, description FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id = 3;
SELECT gene_name FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionLevels ORDER BY expression_level DESC, gene_id ASC
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, gene_start, gene_end FROM Genes WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT cell_type_name, description FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT gene_id, cell_type, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionLevels WHERE cell_type = 'T-Cells' AND expression_level > 50
SELECT gene_id, AVG(expression_level) as avg_level FROM GeneExpressionLevels GROUP BY gene_id HAVING avg_level > 60 ORDER BY gene_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CellTypes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes;
SELECT expression_id, expression_level FROM ExpressionLevels ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, cell_type_name FROM Genes JOIN ExpressionLevels ON Genes.gene_id = ExpressionLevels.gene_id JOIN CellTypes ON ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id;
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes WHERE gene_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT cell_type_name, expression_level FROM CellTypes JOIN ExpressionLevels ON CellTypes.cell_type_id = ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id WHERE expression_level > 0.5;

SELECT gene_name, cell_type_name, expression_level FROM Genes JOIN ExpressionLevels ON Genes.gene_id = ExpressionLevels.gene_id JOIN CellTypes ON ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;

SELECT gene_name, cell_type_name, result_notes FROM Genes JOIN ExpressionLevels ON Genes.gene_id = ExpressionLevels.gene_id JOIN AnalysisResults ON ExpressionLevels.expression_id = AnalysisResults.expression_id WHERE result_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionLevels;
SELECT gene_symbol, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionLevels WHERE cell_type='neuron';
SELECT AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM GeneExpressionLevels WHERE cell_type='fibroblast';
SELECT gene_symbol, annotation FROM GeneAnnotations ORDER BY gene_symbol ASC;
SELECT study_name, research_area FROM Studies WHERE research_area='Cancer' ORDER BY study_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionLevels ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE gene_symbol='TP53';
SELECT cell_type, AVG(expression_level) FROM GeneExpressionLevels GROUP BY cell_type;

SELECT Studies.study_name, CellTypes.cell_type_name, AnalysisResults.result_value FROM Studies INNER JOIN AnalysisResults ON Studies.id = AnalysisResults.study_id INNER JOIN CellTypes ON CellTypes.cell_type_name = AnalysisResults.cell_type WHERE Studies.research_area='Cancer';

SELECT GeneAnnotations.gene_symbol, GeneAnnotations.annotation, GeneExpressionLevels.expression_level FROM GeneAnnotations LEFT JOIN GeneExpressionLevels ON GeneAnnotations.gene_symbol = GeneExpressionLevels.gene_symbol WHERE GeneExpressionLevels.expression_level > 5;
